version_description:
Holding out for a hero? How about a Pawscout update:
• If you’re looking to find yourself, we recommend yoga. But to learn how safe your neighborhood is, check out our new Safety Map! It lets you know how many fellow Pawscouters are protecting pets in your area.
• Time to fumigate already?! We’ve fixed some bugs to make your Pawscout experience smoother.

Cue the fireworks and the brass band, this is our biggest Pawscout update yet! Today, we’re happy to introduce Pawscout Community, a new way of seeing your neighborhood and the pets who live there:
• Connect with pets nearby. See (and safeguard) pets near you, at a further maximum range than ever before.
• Like it, love it. Like pets near you and give them (and their hoomans) a warm fuzzy.
• Pet profiles are getting a glow up! Along with the new look, now you can post a gallery of adorable photos instead of just one.
• We’ve made adding your pet a quicker, more colorful process. On to the good stuff!

• Bug fixes

• “Found Pet.” We’ve made it easier than ever to protect pets with Pawscout. If a lost Pawscout pet is found by someone who doesn’t have a Pawscout account, they’ll be guided through a simple process to contact the owner.
• We’ve also included updates to make it easier for existing Pawscout users to report a lost pet.

• “Found Pet.” We’ve made it easier than ever to protect pets with Pawscout. If a lost Pawscout pet is found by someone who doesn’t have a Pawscout account, they’ll be guided through a simple process to contact the owner.
• We’ve also included updates to make it easier for existing Pawscout users to report a lost pet.

You feelin’ lucky ... pup? You should! We’ve got a new Pawscout update:

• Updated Tag pairing. We’ve improved the process of pairing your Pawscout Tag, so you can get right to the important stuff: safeguarding your pet.
• Bug fixes. Just part of spring cleaning.

You feelin’ lucky ... pup? You should! We’ve got a new Pawscout update:

• Updated Tag pairing. We’ve improved the process of pairing your Pawscout Tag, so you can get right to the important stuff: safeguarding your pet.
• Bug fixes. Just part of spring cleaning.

We don’t wanna blow our own horn, but—oh, what are we saying, of course we do! We’re chasing our tails in delight over one of our biggest releases yet:
• Announcing Pawscout’s Social Feed! Share pics, comment on posts, plan walks and playdates, and let your local community know all about your pet’s adventures.
• Ding ding ding! Our outdoor virtual pet leash now features a notification sound.
• User profiles have gotten a facelift.
• We’ve fixed a few bugs, including some that were affecting lost pet notifications.

Can’t stop won’t stop updating our social features! New in this release:
• Where you lead, I will follow. Follow your favorite people (and pets) and see their activity as your default social feed view.
• Is it me you’re looking for? Search for users and pets by name.
• It’s a bird, it’s a plane. We’re showing our most active users some appreciation and highlighting them as “Superscouts.”
• Bug fixes. Bugs may plague your Memorial Day BBQs, but we got them out of your App.

Can’t stop won’t stop updating our social features! New in this release:
• Where you lead, I will follow. Follow your favorite people (and pets) and see their activity as your default social feed view.
• Is it me you’re looking for? Search for users and pets by name.
• It’s a bird, it’s a plane. We’re showing our most active users some appreciation and highlighting them as “Superscouts.”
• Bug fixes. Bugs may plague your Memorial Day BBQs, but we got them out of your App.

This is a big one! We’re happy to announce our latest improvements to the Pawscout App:
* Lost Pet Report. Now when you mark your pet as lost, you’ll be guided through a simple incident report that’s shared to your social feed.
* A digital lost pet flyer. Each Lost Pet report automatically gets its own unique URL. Alert your community on any social media platform or website, and signal-boost fellow Pawscouters’ Lost Pet reports.
* We’ve also made some improvements to the look and feel of your feed.

This is a big one! We’re happy to announce our latest improvements to the Pawscout App:
* Lost Pet Report. Now when you mark your pet as lost, you’ll be guided through a simple incident report that’s shared to your social feed.
* A digital lost pet flyer. Each Lost Pet report automatically gets its own unique URL. Alert your community on any social media platform or website, and signal-boost fellow Pawscouters’ Lost Pet reports.
* We’ve also made some improvements to the look and feel of your feed.

Today’s Pawscout update is all about the map:

• You asked, we answer! In response to feedback from Pawscouters like you, we’ve changed how your pet (and their Pawscout Tag) appear on the map.
• You’ll also now see a distance estimate of how far your pet is from you while they’re in range. We calculate this number based on your Tag’s signal strength, so it may vary based on battery, electronic interference, and other factors.
• We’ve changed the look and feel of the Home screen.
• And last but not least, we bashed a few bugs.

Today’s Pawscout update is all about the map:

• You asked, we answer! In response to feedback from Pawscouters like you, we’ve changed how your pet (and their Pawscout Tag) appear on the map.
• You’ll also now see a distance estimate of how far your pet is from you while they’re in range. We calculate this number based on your Tag’s signal strength, so it may vary based on battery, electronic interference, and other factors.
• We’ve changed the look and feel of the Home screen.
• And last but not least, we bashed a few bugs.

Ready for another round of #updates, Pawscouters?

• #hashtagtime. We’ve added hashtags to your #pawscout #socialfeed #experience. Search a selected tag to view posts relevant to your interests.
• Kid, you’re going places. URLs in the feed are now functioning hyperlinks. In addition, every post you make in the social feed now has its own unique URL, so you can share it anywhere.
• We’ve also implemented a few bug fixes and improvements to the App’s look and feel.

• Kid, you’re going places. URLs in the feed are now functioning hyperlinks. In addition, every post you make in the social feed now has its own unique URL, so you can share it anywhere.
• We’ve also implemented a few bug fixes and improvements to the App’s look and feel.

Hello Pawscouters! Today we’ve got one big notification for you:
• A new notification. Now when you’re using the Outdoor Virtual Pet Leash, you’ll be alerted not just when your pet strays out of range, but when they wander back in. We hope this reduces headaches and helps you have more fun in the sun.

Hello Pawscouters! Today we’ve got one big notification for you:
• A new notification. Now when you’re using the Outdoor Virtual Pet Leash, you’ll be alerted not just when your pet strays out of range, but when they wander back in. We hope this reduces headaches and helps you have more fun in the sun.

Howdy, pet people! Here’s what’s new from Pawscout:
• Guardians of the (pet) galaxy: Your pet’s Guardians are the fabulous folks you trust to look after your four-legged bestie when you’re not around. We’ve updated our experience to give you updates on your pet’s location when they’re with a Guardian. We’ve also made it much easier to multiply the reach of your Pawscout Tag by adding Guardians.
• As ever, we’re bashing bugs to make your life easier.

We’ve updated our experience to give you updates on your pet’s location when they’re with a Guardian. We’ve also made it much easier to multiply the reach of your Pawscout Tag by adding Guardians.
• As ever, we’re bashing bugs to make your life easier.
We’ve fixed a few bugs to make your Pawscout experience better.
We’ve fixed a few bugs to make your Pawscout experience better.
This release includes bug fixes and pawsome new features.
This release includes bug fixes and pawsome new features.

Hello, bow-wow, and prrr, Pawscout people! Ready for your updates?

• There’s no change like home. Your Home screen is now My Pets. We’ve put your pets and their Tags front and center, so it’s easy to stay organized.
• Profiles in furr-age. Pet profiles got a sleek redesign. They now display all your pet’s info and activities, including social posts.
• Read all about it! We’ve added labels to the icons on our bottom navigation.
• Bug fixes. We left no stone unturned and no bug unbashed.

Hello, bow-wow, and prrr, Pawscout people! Ready for your updates?

• There’s no change like home. Your Home screen is now My Pets. We’ve put your pets and their Tags front and center, so it’s easy to stay organized.
• Profiles in furr-age. Pet profiles got a sleek redesign. They now display all your pet’s info and activities, including social posts.
• Read all about it! We’ve added labels to the icons on our bottom navigation.
• Bug fixes. We left no stone unturned and no bug unbashed.

Can you sniff a change in the wind? It’s a whole new way to Pawscout:
• Introducing Pet Parents. We’re expanding beyond Guardians with a new type of Pawscout user, the Pet Parent. These ultra-trusted family and loved ones share full access to your pet’s Pawscout account. They can manage Tags, send and receive location updates, and make changes to your pet’s profile and gallery.
• We fixed some oopses in the App, so you can protect your pets with no interruptions.

Be well and stay kind, everybody!

Be well and stay kind, everybody!
This release includes bug fixes and pawsome new features.

In stressful times, you don’t need extra worries on your plate. Pawscout has a new way to safeguard your furry best friend--our annual subscription, Pawscout Pro.

For $14.99/year, here’s what you get:

• Extra alerts. Get additional alerts if your Tag goes offline.
• VIP Support (Very Important Pawson). Priority assistance from Pawscout support.
• Year’s supply of batteries (US and Canada shipping only).
• A scanner barkly. Quickly scan your Tag’s firmware status and battery level.
• Never forget where you came from. Access your Pawscout Tag’s full location history.

For $14.99/year, here’s what you get:

• Year’s supply of batteries (US and Canada shipping only).
• A scanner barkly. Quickly scan your Tag’s firmware status and battery level.
• Never forget where you came from. Access your Pawscout Tag’s full location history.

At Pawscout, we strive to give all pets our best. 
To that end, we have completely revamped medical profiles. 
Looking for Rex's soulmate? Don't forget to enter his astrological sign. 
On a more serious note, please use the new features to include all medical conditions and medications to make it easy for a rescuer to care for your pet until he/she is safely returned to you.

At Pawscout, we strive to give all pets our best. 
To that end, we have completely revamped medical profiles. 
Looking for Rex's soulmate? Don't forget to enter his astrological sign. 
On a more serious note, please use the new features to include all medical conditions and medications to make it easy for a rescuer to care for your pet until he/she is safely returned to you.

You asked; we listened. Our walk feature - for Pawscout Tag users only - is one of our most popular, so it was high time for a reboot. Strolling is one of the best things you can do for you and your pet's health, and Pawscout's revamped features make it easier than ever to track your walks, measure your activity - and even brag about all your ambulatory achievements to your friends.

This new version offers a completely new user interface for walks, including:
• A beautiful, visual summary of each individual walk.
• The ability to quickly post progress reports to your favourite social media channels.
• A completely new way to store location coordinates so that walk data is more accurate than ever.
• A detailed diary to review your walks by distance, time and day.

Enjoy, and as always, please write to support@pawscout.com with suggestions and feedback.

At Pawscout, we constantly strive to make our app the best version of itself so you and your furry sidekick can be the best versions of yourselves. The newest from Pawscout Labs is a small change with a big pawprint.

From now on, customize all of your notifications at a granular level exactly the way you like them. Too busy for social alerts? Take a beat, pause, or turn off notifications altogether. Want to make sure that you're always on the receiving end of notifications about your pet's health and safety? Make sure those notifications are on. Just go to Pawscout → Your Profile → Settings, and customize away.

Enjoy, and as always, please write to support@pawscout.com with suggestions and feedback.

From now on, customize all of your notifications at a granular level exactly the way you like them. Too busy for social alerts? Take a beat, pause, or turn off notifications altogether. Want to make sure that you're always on the receiving end of notifications about your pet's health and safety? Make sure those notifications are on. Just go to Pawscout → Your Profile → Settings, and customize away.

Enjoy, and as always, please write to support@pawscout.com with suggestions and feedback.

The holidays are all about sharing and putting our best paw forward, and now you can do that more easily than ever on Pawscout with direct messaging.

Our new release automatically creates group pet chats so that you can make sure your kid is really walking the dog and changing the kitty litter, or just share goofy pet photos with a captive and adoring audience: your pet parents and guardians. You can also contact any Pawscouter directly by selecting their profile and then the “Message” icon. Don’t want to be bothered? You can always mute pet chats or direct messages.

We are very excited to bring these major changes from our hearth to yours. Happy holidays, stay safe, and as always, please write to support@pawscout.com with suggestions and feedback.
